ygData.subject: Charming Equipment Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: I have just hit the magical level 27 over the weekend. I have talked to many people in game that say I won t get much benefit from more Charisma over my 123 I
ygData.messageBody:
I have just hit the magical level 27 over the weekend. I have talked to many people in game that say
I won't get much benefit from more Charisma over my 123 I have now.

Now the question I have is this true? If so can you advise some equipment for me to get to raise my
charisma up some? Also should I use a Mino Horn or just hold my crude stein?

My biggest concern is not losing to much strength. I have a 107 now.

Currently I have:

Chest: Bronze Breast
Face: Mask of Deception
Rings Jagged Bands (2)
Ears: Opalline Earrings (2)
Hands: Elf Hide Gloves
Head: Skull Shaped Barbrute
Shoulders: Blood Stained Mantle
Neck: Cape of the Midnight Mist
Legs: Shin Greaves
Feet: Banded Boots
Wrists: Bronze Bracer
Wrists: Bracer of Erollisi
Arms: Barbed Armplates
Waist: Troll Hide Belt

Thanks in advance
Ranian Aeleroth
